flusspferd::create_on

flusspferd::create_on Class Reference

#include <flusspferd/create_on.hpp>

 Create a value of type Class on the container.

Detailed Description

Create multiple values / objects / stuff on a container.

It works like flusspferd::create, except that the name parameter is always the first.

 flusspferd::create_on(container)
     .create<function>("funName", &my_function)
     .create<object>("objName", my_prototype)
     // ... 
     ;
See also:
flusspferd::create

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Constructor.

Parameters:
container The container to put the newly created objects on.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename Class >
create_on const& flusspferd::create_on::create (   ...  )  const [inline]

Create a value of type Class on the container.

Like flusspferd::create, but it does not take a container argument and the name argument is always first and required.
